How Many Items Will Inventory Hold?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Items, Accessories, Foods: How Many Items Will Inventory Hold?
By Lisa Shock on Monday, October 1, 2001 - 12:16 pm:

There is one slot to hold a tech bit, stone or orb.
(If you get one you don't want sell it, or give it to another monster, because when you find one you need, you will have discard the first one.)

There are 4 slots for durable items.
(You will never have to make decisions about discarding these. One slot is for the medicine chest. There's one each for a stress reducing item, a fatigue reducing item and a recovery item. These 3 categories have items of different prices. If you buy the cheap items, then purchase te more expensive ones, half the purchase price of the less expensive ones will be refunded, and it will be replaced in your inventory by the more expensive item.)

There are 10 slots for depleting items.
(Items you find on expedition should be fed to your monster, or sold promtly, to free up your inventory space. As you play, you will receive gifts with a value of 0, which cannot be purchased.)

The breeder (check view mode) can hold 12 disc chips.
(Trade with opponents to get 4 of a kind and make a new encyclopedia entry in town.)

Each main monster type can have 10 accessories in its accessory inventory.
(You the breeder retain these accessories, they are re-usable by many generations.)

There are 10 slots for Heart Crystals.
